Tools, games, and other dedicated software for the keycubes.

3D Typing Simulator

Typing practice software that uses the cubic dimension to create an immersive experience. Users can practice typing on different faces of the cube.

Cubic Keyboard Customization Software

Software that allows users to customize key layouts, keyboard shortcuts, and LED colors to match their preferences.
